esfiji 0.1.0
  • Reference

Change the opacity of svg groups

svg_groups_opacify.Rd

Change the opacity of svg groups

svg_groups_opacify(svg, groups, output, folder = ".", verbose = FALSE,
  export = "--export-area-page", trim = FALSE, node = "*",
  attribute = "id", output_format = "png")

Arguments

svg

The svg
groups

Tibble containing an id column (the id of the group) and an opacity column (double between 0 and 1)
output

The output name, will be appended with .svg and/or .png
folder

The folder in which the output will be saved
verbose

Verbosity
export

Inkscape argument for exporting
trim

Whether to trim the png
node

What svg to look for, defaults to a group (which can include layers)
attribute

What attribute to look for, defaults to id
output_format

Whether to output the svg, png or pdf

Value

The location of the png image

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
